subtitle: A very easy meal

method.text: In a large pan, stir together the tomatoes, onion, blended cornflour, basil, Italian seasoning and pepper sauce.
Bring to the boil, stirring constantly, until the sauce thickens.
Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti in a large pan of boiling water, according to pack instructions, until 'al dente'.
Add the prawns to the sauce, season to taste and cook for 1-3 min or until cooked and heated through.
Drain the spaghetti and divide into individual hot serving plates. Top the pasta with the prawn sauce and serve.

title: Pasta with prawn and tomato sauce
